children.text: If success is “getting the result you were hoping for” then it shouldn’t be any surprise that the people who are most successful are those who
do the right things, at the right time, in the right order
Doing the right things is largely a matter of whatever strategies you subscribe to.
(Most diets/businesses/products fail precisely for this reason.)
Doing things at the right time and in the right order is what saves time. Because the inverse--doing things at the wrong time or in the wrong order--is a phenomenal way to waste it.
And so—because doing the right things at the right time in right order is the secret to success—knowing precisely not only
when you need to do it
, at every step of the way, is truly priceless.
